Class ARToolkitPlus

java.lang.Object

public final class ARToolkitPlus
extends Object

This class represents an implementation of the augmented reality toolkit operations.

Constructor Detail

ARToolkitPlus

public ARToolkitPlus(int width,
                     int height,
                     int maxPatterns,
                     int patternWidth,
                     int patternHeight,
                     int patternSamples,
                     int maxLoadPatterns)
Creates a new toolkit instance with the given values.

Parameters:
width - The image width.
height - The image height.
maxPatterns - The maximum number of patterns to detect.
patternWidth - A pattern width.
patternHeight - A pattern height.
patternSamples - The number of samples in a pattern.
maxLoadPatterns - The number of loaded patterns at a given time. Only used when doing multi tracking.
Since:
1
Method Detail

init

public final boolean init(String calibFile,
                          float nearClip,
                          float farClip)
Initiates the toolkit by providing a file with camera calibration parameters and values for the clipping fields.

Parameters:
calibFile - The path to the calibration file.
nearClip - The value of the near clipping field.
farClip - The value of the far clipping field.
Returns:
True if the toolkit initiation is successful, false if not.
Since:
1

init

public final boolean init(String calibFile,
                          float nearClip,
                          float farClip,
                          int markerMode,
                          float patternWidth,
                          float borderWidth)
Initiates the toolkit by providing a file with camera calibration parameters, values for the clipping fields and marker type. The default values are the RGB pixel format, the automatic threshold level of 150, the Standard undistortion mode, the RPP pose estimator and half resolution image processing. This are regarded as optimal parameters.

Parameters:
calibFile - The path to the calibration file.
nearClip - The value of the near clipping field.
farClip - The value of the far clipping field.
markerMode - The marker type.
patternWidth - The pattern width
borderWidth - The pattern border width
Returns:
True if the toolkit initiation is successful, false if not.
Since:
1

detectMarkers

public final int detectMarkers(byte[] image)
Detects markers on a given image. Stores the detected markers ids in an array that can be retrieved with getDetectedMarkers

Parameters:
image - The image to analyze.
Returns:
The number of markers detected on the image.
Since:
1

getDetectedMarkers

public final int[] getDetectedMarkers()
Returns the resulting markers detected on an image.

Returns:
An array with the identification of the detected markers or an empty array if there's no markers.
Since:
1

selectBestMarkerByConfidence

public final int selectBestMarkerByConfidence()
Selects the best marker, based on the confidence with which it was detected.

Returns:
The identification of the best marker based on the toolkit confidence of it.
Since:
1
